snippet: New rules unveiled will allow many American citizens to avoid long separations from family members who are illegal immigrants as they apply to become legal residents.
abstract: Obama administration unveils new rules that will allow many American citizens to avoid long separations from family members who are illegal immigrants as they apply to become legal residents.
lead_paragraph: New rules unveiled will allow many American citizens to avoid long separations from family members who are illegal immigrants as they apply to become legal residents.

headline.seo: Immigration Change Will Ease Family Separations
headline.main: Immigration Change to Ease Family Separations
headline.print_headline: Immigration Change to Ease Family Separations
